attributes.additional_details: Trick Or Treating is an annoying and often frightening custom that is particularly worrying for the elderly and vulnerable.  It provides ample opportunity for yobs all over the country, to cause great anger and distress within a community.  The custom is all too often used by largely spoilt and ill behaved brats whose parents do not give a jot what their children are doing at any  given time.   Why are affluent children begging for treats at all?
